unix-time.name: Unix Time Converter
unix-time.description: Convert between Unix timestamp and human-readable date format

random.name: Random Generator
random.description: Generate random strings, numbers, UUIDs, passwords and lists
random.medium: Medium (letters, numbers and some special characters)
random.strong: Strong (letters, numbers and many special characters)

jwt-decoder.name: JWT Decoder
jwt-decoder.description: Parse and decode JWT (JSON Web Token)
jwt-decoder.signatureInfo: The JWT signature is used to verify the integrity of the token. This tool only decodes the header and payload, it cannot verify the signature.

errors.invalidFormat: Invalid JWT format. Expected format: xxxxx.yyyyy.zzzzz
errors.decodeFailed: Failed to decode JWT. The token may be malformed.
errors.clipboardAccess: Cannot access clipboard. Please grant permission or paste manually.

json-formatter.name: JSON Formatter
json-formatter.feature1: Format and beautify JSON with proper indentation
json-formatter.feature3: Minify JSON by removing unnecessary whitespace

url-encoder.name: URL Encoder/Decoder
url-encoder.encodePlaceholder: Enter text or URL to encode...
url-encoder.infoDescription: URL encoding converts characters into a format that can be transmitted over the Internet.
url-encoder.encodeUriInfo: Encodes a URI by escaping all characters except A-Z a-z 0-9 - _ . ! ~ * ' ( ) ; , / ? : @ & = + $ #
url-encoder.encodeUriComponentInfo: Encodes a URI component by escaping all characters except A-Z a-z 0-9 - _ . ! ~ * ' ( )

base64.name: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
base64.aboutDescription: Base64 is a group of binary-to-text encoding schemes that represent binary data in an ASCII string format.
base64.useCase1: Embedding images in HTML or CSS
base64.useCase2: Storing complex data in XML or JSON

hash-generator.name: Hash Generator
hash-generator.description: Generate various hashes (MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, etc.)
hash-generator.aboutDescription: Hash functions are mathematical algorithms that convert data of arbitrary size to a fixed-size hash value.
hash-generator.sha1Info: 160-bit hash, considered insecure for cryptographic use
hash-generator.note: Note: MD5 hashing is not available in this demo. For production use, consider using a dedicated library.

qr-generator.name: QR Code Generator
qr-generator.description: Generate QR codes from text, URLs, or contact information
qr-generator.aboutDescription: QR Code (Quick Response) is a type of matrix barcode that can store data and be scanned with a smartphone camera.
qr-generator.feature1: Generate QR codes for text, URLs, emails, phone numbers
qr-generator.feature2: Create WiFi QR codes for easy password sharing
qr-generator.feature4: Customize size, colors, and error correction levels

ip-checker.name: IP Address Checker
ip-checker.aboutDescription: The IP checker tool helps you view your public IP address and detailed geolocation information.

domain-ip.name: Domain to IP
domain-ip.description: Check IP address from domain name

errors.noRecords: No DNS records found for this domain

domain-ip.aboutDescription: This tool helps you find the IP address of a domain and display detailed DNS information.
domain-ip.feature1: Look up IP addresses from domain names
domain-ip.feature2: Display all IP addresses (if multiple exist)
domain-ip.feature3: View detailed IP and ISP information
domain-ip.feature4: Save lookup history for easy tracking

lorem-ipsum.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
lorem-ipsum.description: Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder text by words or characters
lorem-ipsum.aboutDescription: Lorem Ipsum is placeholder text used in the printing and design industry. It has been the industry's standard dummy text since the 16th century.
lorem-ipsum.feature1: Generate text by words, sentences, paragraphs, or characters
lorem-ipsum.feature2: Option to start with traditional 'Lorem ipsum'

color-to-image.name: Color to Image
color-to-image.description: Convert colors to PNG images for use in designs

errors.clipboardError: Failed to copy to clipboard. Your browser may not support this feature.

color-to-image.aboutDescription: This tool lets you convert colors to images that can be downloaded and used in your projects. It supports solid colors, gradients, and transparency.

useCase1.title: Web Design
useCase1.description: Create simple colored backgrounds for websites and UI elements

useCase2.title: Placeholder Images
useCase2.description: Generate placeholder images with specific dimensions for mockups

useCase3.title: Color Swatch
useCase3.description: Create color swatches for design systems and style guides

useCase4.title: Gradients
useCase4.description: Create gradient images for backgrounds or design elements

regex-tester.name: Regex Tester
regex-tester.description: Test and debug regular expressions with real-time results
regex-tester.testTextPlaceholder: Enter text to test the regex against
regex-tester.replacementPlaceholder: Enter replacement text ($1, $2, etc. for capture groups)
regex-tester.savePatternPrompt: Test a pattern and click 'Save Pattern' to add it here
regex-tester.caretExample: matches abc at the start of a string
regex-tester.dollarExample: matches abc at the end of a string
regex-tester.asterisk: 0 or more of the preceding character
regex-tester.plus: 1 or more of the preceding character
regex-tester.plusExample: matches a, aa, aaa, etc. (but not '')
regex-tester.question: 0 or 1 of the preceding character
regex-tester.wordExample: matches any sequence of word characters
regex-tester.whitespaceExample: matches a space between a and b
regex-tester.characterClass: Any one character in the brackets
regex-tester.captureGroupExample: matches abc, abcabc, etc. and captures each abc

flags.multiline: ^ and $ match start/end of each line

word-counter.name: Word Counter
word-counter.description: Count words, characters, lines and paragraphs in text
word-counter.placeholder: Enter or paste your text here to count words, characters, and more...
word-counter.aboutDescription: This tool counts the number of words, characters, sentences, paragraphs, and lines in your text. It also provides reading time estimates and word frequency analysis.

feature1.title: Basic Statistics
feature1.description: Count characters, words, sentences, paragraphs, and lines

feature2.title: Reading Time
feature2.description: Estimate reading and speaking time based on word count

feature3.title: Word Frequency
feature3.description: Analyze the most common words in your text

feature4.title: Count Statistics
feature4.description: Copy detailed statistics to use in other applications

word-counter.useCase1: Check essay or article word counts for assignments
word-counter.useCase2: Estimate reading time for presentations or blog posts
word-counter.useCase3: Analyze word usage patterns in writing
word-counter.useCase4: Optimize content length for SEO or social media posts

remove-duplicate-lines.name: Remove Duplicate Lines
remove-duplicate-lines.description: Remove duplicate lines from text with various options
remove-duplicate-lines.placeholder: Enter or paste text with duplicate lines here...
remove-duplicate-lines.aboutDescription: This tool removes duplicate lines from text with options for case sensitivity, whitespace trimming, and line sorting.
remove-duplicate-lines.caseSensitiveDescription: When enabled, 'Example' and 'example' are treated as different lines
remove-duplicate-lines.trimWhitespaceDescription: When enabled, leading and trailing whitespace is ignored when comparing lines
remove-duplicate-lines.ignoreEmptyLinesDescription: When enabled, empty lines are ignored and not included in the output
remove-duplicate-lines.sortLinesDescription: When enabled, the output lines are sorted alphabetically
remove-duplicate-lines.useCase1: Clean up logs or data exports with duplicate entries
remove-duplicate-lines.useCase2: Remove duplicate items from lists or inventories
remove-duplicate-lines.useCase4: Clean up code with duplicate import statements or definitions

reverse-text.name: Reverse Text
reverse-text.description: Reverse text by characters, words, or lines with various options
reverse-text.aboutDescription: This tool reverses text in various ways - by characters, words, lines, or their order. It includes options to preserve case and whitespace structure.
reverse-text.reverseTypeDescription: Reverse by characters, words, lines, or reverse the order while keeping the internal structure
reverse-text.preserveCaseDescription: When enabled, uppercase and lowercase letters maintain their case even when reversed
reverse-text.preserveWhitespaceDescription: When enabled, multiple spaces, tabs, and other whitespace is preserved in word reversal
reverse-text.useCase1: Create word puzzles or games with reversed text
reverse-text.useCase2: Test software handling of reversed text or strings
reverse-text.useCase3: Create mirror text effects for creative projects
reverse-text.useCase4: Reorder lines or words for text reorganization

hash-verifier.name: Hash Generator & Verifier
hash-verifier.description: Generate and verify hashes for text or files
hash-verifier.originalTextPlaceholder: Enter original text to verify hash...
hash-verifier.hashPlaceholder: Enter the hash you want to verify...
hash-verifier.hashMatchDescription: The calculated hash matches the expected hash. The content is verified as unchanged.
hash-verifier.hashMismatchDescription: The calculated hash does not match the expected hash. The content may have been modified.
hash-verifier.aboutDescription: This tool allows you to generate cryptographic hashes for text or files and verify hash values to ensure data integrity.
hash-verifier.md5Description: A widely used hash function (128-bit), considered cryptographically broken but still commonly used for checksums.
hash-verifier.sha1Description: A 160-bit hash function, generally no longer considered secure for cryptographic purposes.
hash-verifier.sha256Description: Part of the SHA-2 family, widely used 256-bit hash function with strong security properties.
hash-verifier.sha384Description: A variant of SHA-2 producing a 384-bit hash value for increased security.
hash-verifier.sha512Description: The strongest variant of SHA-2, producing a 512-bit hash value for maximum security.
hash-verifier.useCase1: Verify the integrity of downloaded files by comparing hashes
hash-verifier.useCase2: Ensure data hasn't been tampered with during transmission
hash-verifier.useCase3: Generate checksums for file verification purposes
hash-verifier.useCase4: Compare original and processed data to confirm no changes occurred
hash-verifier.securityNoteText: For sensitive security applications, avoid using MD5 and SHA-1 as they are considered cryptographically weak. SHA-256 or stronger is recommended for security-critical applications.

home.title: JToolset
home.subtitle: A collection of free tools to help make your development work easier and more fun.

feature1.title: Powerful & User-Friendly
feature1.description: Intuitive tools designed to streamline your development workflow with minimal friction.

feature2.title: Works in browser
feature2.description: Process data right in your browser, no data is sent to servers.

feature3.title: Mobile optimized
feature3.description: Responsive design, allowing you to use it on any device.

toolsList.title: All Tools
toolsList.subtitle: Explore all developer tools
toolsList.needSomethingElse: Can't find the tool you need?
toolsList.suggestToolDescription: We are constantly adding new tools. If you have a suggestion for a new tool, please let us know!

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: At JToolset, we are committed to protecting your privacy while providing useful online tools. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.subtitle: What information do we collect?
dataCollection.point1: Usage data when you use our online tools
dataCollection.point3: IP address for analytics and security purposes

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience:
cookies.point2: Analytics cookies to understand user behavior

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We use third-party services to support our website:
thirdParty.googleAnalytics: Google Analytics for website traffic analysis
thirdParty.cloudServices: Cloud hosting and content delivery services

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
userRights.point1: Right to access your personal data
userRights.point3: Right to opt-out of data collection

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.description: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Got a question or suggestion? We'd love to hear from you!
contact.description: Feel free to reach out to us via email for any inquiries, feedback, or collaboration opportunities.
contact.responseTime: We typically respond within a few business days.

about.title: About JToolset
about.description: A free, open-source collection of developer tools designed to make your coding life easier and more enjoyable.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide developers with quick, efficient, and easy-to-use online tools that streamline common development tasks and enhance productivity.

team.title: Who We Are
team.description: A group of passionate developers who believe in creating practical, user-friendly tools that solve real-world coding challenges.

common.shareMessage: If you find this tool useful, share it with your friends and colleagues!
common.desc: A free toolkit for web developers and programmers.
